S04bsu019_u:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:30: anye ca dvātriṃśaddevanikāyā devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā maheśvaranārāyaṇadevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:31: śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiścandrādityavāyuvaruṇādayo devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitāstasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:71: evaṃpramukhāṇi anekāni kinnararājaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:125: evaṃpramukhāṇyanekāni nāgakanyā śatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:233: tadā avīcau mahānarake raśmayo niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:235: sarve te vihārapariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:236: divyamaṇiratnopalitpāḥ [Vaidya_261] stambhāḥ pariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:238: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni dvārāṇi dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:239: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni sopānāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:244: bahirjetavanasya purata udyāne nānāvidhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:252: tena tatra ca ramyāvabhāse tādṛśāni kalpavṛkṣaśatasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni /
S04bsu019_u:253: tasminneva jetavanavihāre vajramayāṇi sopānāni dṛśyante sma,

S04bsu019_u:267_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:271: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:274: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavan,
S04bsu019_u:277: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
S04bsu019_u:281: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
S04bsu019_u:282: evaṃ te sattvā [Vaidya_262] avīcau mahānarake kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:283: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
S04bsu019_u:284: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā,
S04bsu019_u:285: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:289: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau mahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam?
S04bsu019_u:294: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:295: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā /
S04bsu019_u:296: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
S04bsu019_u:298: yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - tasminnavīcimahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu019_u:300: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:305: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:308: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam?
S04bsu019_u:312: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya?
S04bsu019_u:313: atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:314: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma //
S04bsu019_u:315: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:316: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:375: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt //
S04bsu019_u:380: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:381: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avīcīmahānarakānniṣkramya pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:382: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:386: sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:387: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam //
S04bsu019_u:388: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati /
S04bsu019_u:390: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu019_u:395: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:397: sukhitāste jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā [Vaidya_264] ye mātāpitarau satataṃ parigrahamupasthānaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:400: te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
S04bsu019_u:401: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
S04bsu019_u:403: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:405: te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:406: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
S04bsu019_u:407: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:410: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:411: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti /
S04bsu019_u:413: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:414: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca,
S04bsu019_u:425: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu019_u:426: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:427_0: bhagavānāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu019_u:427_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S04bsu019_u:427_2: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:428: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:429: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā //
S04bsu019_u:430: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:433: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:444: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
S04bsu019_u:448: Kvyu_1,4.1 ākāśaṃ liṅgamityāhuḥ pṛthivī tasya pīṭhikā /
S04bsu019_u:450: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:451: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:452: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:453: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:458: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:459: bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā abhūvan,
S04bsu019_u:461: mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:462: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:464: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:470_0: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:470_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:472: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorāgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:473: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam //
S04bsu019_u:474: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni?
S04bsu019_u:476: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:488: tadyathā - hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:491: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:493: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:494: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:496: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
S04bsu019_u:497: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:498: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
S04bsu019_u:499: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:500: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:501: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
S04bsu019_u:508: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca /
S04bsu019_u:509: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:511: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu019_u:512: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:519: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam - kidṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ?
S04bsu019_u:521: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:522_0: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:526: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati,
S04bsu019_u:528: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:533: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:534: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā mahiṣā mārjārādayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:535: eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:536: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:537: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayeddhastaśatasahasrapramāṇam,
S04bsu019_u:539: tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:540: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:541: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:542: na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:543: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
S04bsu019_u:550: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
S04bsu019_u:552: bhagavānāha - yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:554: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
S04bsu019_u:555: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:556: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
S04bsu019_u:557: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum?
S04bsu019_u:558: api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:562: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu019_u:563: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:565: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:568: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu019_u:569: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti //

S04bsu019_u:696: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava /

S04bsu019_u:2498: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2503: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti?
S04bsu019_u:2504: bhagavānāha - tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:2507: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante /
S04bsu019_u:2508: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:2509: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:2514: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2525: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2527: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante /
S04bsu019_u:2534: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
S04bsu019_u:2536: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
S04bsu019_u:2538: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2540: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
S04bsu019_u:2546: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
S04bsu019_u:2555: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:2556: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
S04bsu019_u:2561: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate //
S04bsu019_u:2569: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2570: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2571: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:2576: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu019_u:2580: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu019_u:2581: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
